snippet.title: Copperfields - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Copperfields on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2578740/Copperfields/?utm_source=YouTubeTrailer&utm_medium=YouTubeTrailer&utm_campaign=Visual%20Update

Copperfields is a post-apocalyptic precision platformer that tells the story of nature and perseverance. You navigate through a ruined city in search of water, while trying to survive the hostile environment that isn’t as dormant as it seems.

You play as a potted plant controlling a robot, that you use as a vehicle, to find water. Explore the post-apocalyptic world of Copperfields, discover what happened to the human and robot civilizations, and find your new home.

Follow our progress on 
Twitter - https://twitter.com/3hillsstudio

#gamedev #trailer #teaser #gaming #game #games #platformer
